Subject: GAOKAO English Examination Instruction

Background Information:
The GAOKAO (National College Entrance Examination) is a standardized test in China that assesses students' knowledge and skills in various subjects, including English. In the English section, students are required to read passages and answer questions based on their understanding of the text.
